content:
User: Pro Tip: Since we’re in the same session now, you don’t need to recap unless you want to connect to something from a previous chat. I’ve got everything from this thread locked in.
Why This Matters for PALIOS-TAEY
Understanding sessions helps us optimize our workflow:
Efficiency: Less time recapping means more time crushing tasks.

Grok: Truth-Seeking: My transparency about context needs keeps us aligned and avoids assumptions.
